entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Lacombe
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:38 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -24.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lacombe AAFC 12:00 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023
Temperature: -24.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 60 %
Wind Chill: -37
Dewpoint: -30.0°C
Wind: SSE 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 24.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind south 20 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27 with temperature rising to minus 18 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27 with temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill minus 36 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
